forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight descends on Downtown San Francisco, the evening promises a cocoon of tranquility, wrapped in the soft embrace of mostly clear skies. With the temperature gently tapering to a mild 53 degrees, the brisk west winds whisper through the air, their breezy playfulness urging you to feel the clean essence of the city. It is a time to take in the golden hues of the fading sun while savoring the fresh notes that herald an urban oasis, though the occasional gust—topping out at 25 mph—reminds us that nature still holds sway here.

Looking to Friday, anticipate a sun-drenched canvas, where the cheerful daylight approaches a high near 64 degrees. There’s a subtle drop in temperature as the day unfolds, a gentle reminder of the cool charm that characterizes this coastal paradise, inviting you to layer comfortably in a light jacket or sweater. The clarity of the sky suggests a departing marine layer, which may linger close to the shoreline but will evaporate under the vibrant sun, casting everything in a vivid light that beckons exploration. Today's conditions are a gentle nudge towards leisurely outdoor pursuits—perhaps a stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the numerous cozy cafes, where one can relish a warm drink while gazing upon the city's iconic landscape.
